name: iPhone 14 Pro
description: The iPhone 13 Pro features a stunning Super Retina XDR display, A15 Bionic chip, Pro camera system, and 5G capability. It's the ultimate tool for creativity and productivity.

name: iPhone 13
description: The iPhone 13 boasts a powerful A15 Bionic chip, dual-camera system with Night mode, and a Ceramic Shield front cover for enhanced durability. Experience the latest in iPhone technology.

name: iPhone 12 Mini
description: The iPhone 12 Mini delivers big performance in a compact size. With 5G support, A14 Bionic chip, and a dual-camera system, it's perfect for those who prefer a smaller form factor.

name: iPhone SE (2nd generation)
description: The iPhone SE combines the power of the A13 Bionic chip with the familiar design of the iPhone 8. Enjoy a great camera system, Touch ID, and budget-friendly pricing.

name: iPhone 11
description: The iPhone 11 features a dual-camera system, A13 Bionic chip, and an all-day battery life. Capture stunning photos and videos with Night mode and enjoy immersive experiences.

name: iPhone XR
description: The iPhone XR offers a Liquid Retina display, A12 Bionic chip, and Face ID. It's a colorful and powerful iPhone with advanced features.

name: iPhone X
description: The iPhone X introduced the Super Retina display, Face ID, and a dual-camera system. It set a new standard for design and innovation in smartphones.

name: iPhone 8 Plus
description: The iPhone 8 Plus features a dual-camera system, A11 Bionic chip, and wireless charging capability. It's a powerful and reliable choice for iPhone enthusiasts.

name: iPhone 7
description: The iPhone 7 introduced a water-resistant design, A10 Fusion chip, and a 12MP camera. It's a durable and capable smartphone with a sleek form factor.

name: iPhone 6S
description: The iPhone 6S features 3D Touch, a 12MP camera, and the A9 chip. It's a reliable and user-friendly iPhone with a classic design.
